title: My League Keeps Saying Update Failed
body: So when ever i load up my LOL it goes up like 2% max then says update failed i've tried to use the hextech repair tool Its done nothing and ive tried every solution on the internet Like Making the NotePad "S_OK" (Im on the new client i believe) and i'm just wanting to play so bad please help me {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Since you keep getting stuck before 30%, theres a good chance that your OS is blocking the patcher from scanning the game files. Make sure to go through the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for how you can make sure your OS is letting the patcher do it's thing.
Nothing happened it still does the same thing
